Title: A Hand in Cultivation
Description:
Greetings mortal, I have word from our Head Gardener Gryrmpech. The word is that the gardens are in a state of chaos, but I don't know if that is abnormal.

They assured me that they have it in hand--actually, 'in shovel' is the phrase they used. I am not sure what they are meaning; I am sure they will fill you in. Please, seek them out and they will outfit you appropriately for the situation.
ObjectivesText: Seek out Gryrmpech in the Gardens of Unity.
RewardText:
A garden keeper needs their own weapons. Let me outfit you for battle. 

I have more tools of war if you need. I appreciate your help taming these wilds!
